column1: Little Goat Diner////Food was great but the service was terrible. I came in at 8pm the other night and got seated at a corner booth but was ignored for 20 minutes so I left. I decided to give it another try so I went in for lunch today. I was seated at the kitchen counter and was barely "tolerated" by the waiter. A white business man came in after and sat next to me and was always served first. When the waiter saw the manager talking with him
column2: she made sure he got extra service and again barely "tolerated" me. Both of these incidents made me feel there is a certain sense of classism pervading this establishment. I am a women of color and grew up in be Midwest so being treated differently is not new to me
column3: but I expected to be treated equally as a paying customer at this reputable restaurant and it sadly wasn't the case. I won't be returning.
